name: Arresterdramon
description: Arresterdramon is a Dragon Digimon. It is a form of Gumdramon that digivolved by removing its " Kinkoji " ( 緊箍児 , " Kinkoji " ? lit. "Tight-bound Child") . It uses a special rubber Battle Armor as its clothing, which manifests Gumdramon's characteristic litheness at its maximum and further strengthens its defensive side. Its wings have gotten larger, enabling high speed flight. By changing its tail into a Tail Anchor, it has become able to arrest the opponent in addition to tearing them apart.
